scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m 'Update deploy script' || echo 'No package changes' && git switch deploy && git rm -rf --quiet . && cp -r ../my-portfolio/dist/* . || echo 'No dist folder found' && git add -A && git commit -m 'Deploy update' || echo 'No changes to commit' && git push -f origin deploy && git switch main || git switch main
